sessions.description: Document Collaboration Integration Session - v8.0 Enhancement

interactions.description: Fixed data structure mismatch (list vs dict) in enrich_with_document_data()
Decision: Increased document collaboration weight from 3% to 5% for comprehensive temporal scoring

details.decision: Increased document collaboration weight from 3% to 5% for comprehensive temporal scoring
details.reasoning: Document sharing with temporal analysis provides significant collaboration signal beyond simple count

accomplishments.description: Integrated document_collaboration_api.py into collaborator_discovery.py
Built comprehensive testing suite (test_document_integration.py, show_comparison.py)
Upgraded algorithm to v8.0_document_sharing_enhanced with 5% document weight
Discovered ranking impact: Zhitao Hou +8 positions (#10â†’#2), Vani Soff entered Top 5
Created DOCUMENT_INTEGRATION_SUMMARY.md with complete implementation guide
Updated .cursorrules with document integration lessons and achievements

sessions.description: LLM Meeting Classification Integration & Multi-Source Bug Fixes

interactions.description: Decision: Keep v7.0 keyword classification as stable baseline, add LLM as optional enhancement only

details.decision: Keep v7.0 keyword classification as stable baseline, add LLM as optional enhancement only
details.reasoning: LLM rate limiting makes it unreliable for production; keyword-based gives 70-80% accuracy with no API limits

accomplishments.description: Fixed Bug #1: Chat-only collaborators final_score=0 issue by using collaboration_score for multi-source collaborators
Fixed Bug #2-5: Results dictionary key mismatch, multi-source evidence requirements, filtering logic - enabled discovery of 19 collaborators
Created test_basic_collaborator_discovery.py baseline validation script - establishes v7.0 stable baseline
Integrated GPT-5, GPT-4.1, and GPT-4o meeting classifiers (partial - rate limited)
Documented comprehensive lessons in .cursorrules - LLM Meeting Classification Integration section with 5 bugs, fixes, and process violations

sessions.description: Dormant collaborator detection and conference room filtering implementation

interactions.description: Decision: Use Graph API type field instead of keywords for resource detection

details.decision: Use Graph API type field instead of keywords for resource detection
details.reasoning: User feedback: keywords are fragile, language-dependent, miss variations. Graph API type field is authoritative, language-agnostic, 100% reliable

interactions.description: Decision: Set 90+ days as HIGH RISK dormancy threshold

details.decision: Set 90+ days as HIGH RISK dormancy threshold
details.reasoning: Balances re-engagement urgency with avoiding false positives. 90 days = 3 months provides clear signal for relationship maintenance needs

interactions.description: Decision: Filter resources at data extraction level (line 1369) rather than post-processing

details.decision: Filter resources at data extraction level (line 1369) rather than post-processing
details.reasoning: Early filtering ensures all downstream analysis operates on clean data. More efficient and prevents resource leakage into any analysis path

interactions.description: Decision: Separate active and dormant collaborator displays

details.decision: Separate active and dormant collaborator displays
details.reasoning: User requirement for re-engagement focus. Dormant list enables targeted relationship maintenance campaigns. Active list focuses on current collaboration priorities

accomplishments.description: Built fast_dormancy_detection.py for efficient 90+ day dormancy check across 7 months of calendar data
Created show_top_20_with_dormant_separation.py integrating dormancy detection with collaborator rankings
Discovered Graph API attendee.type field for reliable resource filtering (resource vs required/optional)
Replaced fragile keyword-based conference room detection with metadata-based type field filtering
Updated collaborator_discovery.py line 1369 to filter attendees by type field at data extraction level
Validated results: 59 active + 8 dormant = 67 collaborators, removed 3 conference rooms from rankings
Created show_quick_top20_and_dormants.py for instant display of active top 20 and all dormant collaborators

interactions.description: Decision: Create comprehensive algorithm documentation (COLLABORATOR_DETECTION_ALGORITHM.md) before ending session

details.decision: Create comprehensive algorithm documentation (COLLABORATOR_DETECTION_ALGORITHM.md) before ending session
details.reasoning: User requested algorithm summary. Comprehensive documentation serves multiple purposes: technical audit, team onboarding, research reference, IP documentation. 500+ lines covers all aspects of v8.0 system

accomplishments.description: Created COLLABORATOR_DETECTION_ALGORITHM.md - comprehensive 500+ line technical summary of v8.0 algorithm
Documented complete algorithm: 4 data sources, 10 components, scoring formulas, performance metrics, business impact
Updated .cursorrules with algorithm documentation reference and session completion notes
Completed daily interaction logging for October 25-26 sessions (4 sessions, 21 accomplishments total)

interactions.description: Decision: Document meeting data per .cursorrules requirements

details.reasoning: User commanded 'remember this as .cursorrules demanded' - must document production dataset status, coverage, and management practices for future session continuity

accomplishments.description: Analyzed production calendar dataset (my_calendar_events_complete_attendees.json)
Extracted temporal patterns and monthly distribution
Updated .cursorrules with Latest Meeting Data section (lines 101-135)
Added Calendar Data Management Lessons to .cursorrules (lines 486-496)

decisions_made.reasoning: User feedback: keywords are fragile, language-dependent, miss variations. Graph API type field is authoritative, language-agnostic, 100% reliable
